name: Welcome To... Chichester 0 - Preview
description: When the self-proclaimed "best secret agent in the world" starts his week-long holiday, he is anticipating nothing more than a simple hiking holiday with a grizzled guide up an unnamed mountain. Unfortunately for him, his enemies decided that would be far too boring...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 upwards Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
